sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { ShoppingBag, User, Menu, X, LogOut, Plus } from 'lucide-react'; const Navbar = () => { const { user, isAuthenticated, logout } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/'); setIsMenuOpen(false); }; return (
{/* Logo */}
ReWear {/* Desktop Navigation */}
Browse Items {isAuthenticated ? ( <> Add Item My Swaps
Dashboard Profile
) : (
Login Sign Up
)}
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile Navigation */} {isMenuOpen && (
setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Browse Items {isAuthenticated ? ( <> setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Add Item setIsMenuOpen(false)} > My Swaps setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Dashboard setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Profile ) : ( <> setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Login setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Sign Up )}
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
